I think my family would be surprised and confused, but ultimately supportive.
we drink beer and eat food.
I take time to indulge in my imagination.

participant_2.background:
I'm 5'10", but I feel like I'm taller than that because of my hair.
i am pursuing my law degree.
i m always looking for wildlife when i m outside.
i make friends fast and say goodbye fast.
I'm afraid of forgetting the memories of my travels.

content.text: Hey, I'm participant_1.  How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well today, thank you for asking.  How are you doing?
I am doing well too. What are your interests?
I am interested in law, travel, and wildlife.  What are your interests?
I am interested in music, art, and food.  I love to travel and experience new things.  I also like to spend time in nature.
That's great!  I love to travel too.  I have been to a few different countries.  Where have you been?
I have been to a few countries as well.  I have been to the United States, Canada, Mexico, and the Dominican Republic.  I would love to travel to Europe someday.
Europe would be amazing!  I have always wanted to go to Italy.  I love Italian food.
Italian food is delicious!  I would love to go to Italy too.  I have also heard that Spain is a beautiful country.
Spain is on my list too!  I would love to visit all of the countries in Europe.
I think that would be an amazing experience.  I would love to travel the world someday.
